fields.name: u5qfo3b8k9
fields.label: Apply On
fields.options:
Item Code
Item Group
Brand
Transaction

fields.name: u5qd1ti7ps
fields.label: Mixed Conditions
fields.description: Conditions will be applied on all the selected items combined.

fields.name: u5qtv24ma4
fields.label: Applicable For
fields.options:
Customer
Customer Group
Territory
Sales Partner
Campaign
Supplier
Supplier Group

fields.name: u5qfuov2lr
fields.label: Free Item Rate
fields.description: If rate is zero then item will be treated as "Free Item"

fields.name: u5qrrse43k
fields.label: Is Recursive
fields.description: Discounts to be applied in sequential ranges like buy 1 get 1, buy 2 get 2, buy 3 get 3 and so on

fields.name: u5qlt7a21s
fields.label: Recurse Every (As Per Transaction UOM)
fields.description: Give free item for every N quantity

fields.name: u5qf81i6rl
fields.label: Apply Recursion Over (As Per Transaction UOM)
fields.description: Qty for which recursion isn't applicable.

fields.name: u5qu5rn78q
fields.label: Condition
fields.description: Simple Python Expression, Example: territory != 'All Territories'

fields.name: u5qn57vk1e
fields.label: Threshold for Suggestion (In Percentage)
fields.description: System will notify to increase or decrease quantity or amount

fields.name: u5qp275qac
fields.label: Validate Applied Rule
fields.description: If enabled, then system will only validate the pricing rule and not apply automatically. User has to manually set the discount percentage / margin / free items to validate the pricing rule

fields.name: u5qr4q9g6p
fields.label: Has Priority
fields.description: Enable this checkbox even if you want to set the zero priority

fields.name: u5q28cpp3v
fields.label: Priority
fields.description: Higher the number, higher the priority
